profile.name: Zarouki Achraf
profile.title: Software Developer at NTT DATA | AI Developer

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Mathematical and Computer Sciences
Baccalaureate, Mathematical Sciences A - French Option
education.institution: High School Qualifying Moulay Abdellah Chrif

responsibilities: Working on ASISA: a major Spanish assurance project using Java and Microsoft SQL Server. Develop new products, test them, and fix bugs. Collaborate with clients to ensure all functional aspects work seamlessly.
Worked on Horide: an employee vacation management system using Spring Boot, React, Node.js, Neo4j, and Redis. Developed new features, fixed bugs, and improved existing functionalities.

Working on SAKAI: an internal AI-powered HR tool for selecting optimal CVs, built with Spring Boot, Angular, and PostgreSQL. Implemented security using Spring Security and Keycloak, and supported Docker deployment.
Completed intensive JEE and Java training focused on Spring Boot, Struts, and Hibernate frameworks.
Received soft and hard skills training along with Spanish language courses.
Completed master's degree internship while working as a developer.
Gained extensive experience in Java development and project management.
Built Steadfast Haven: a custom web application for an American client using Next.js with dynamic CMS and SMTP-integrated contact form.
Developed Funny Time for Colleagues: a real-time multiplayer game app using Next.js, Supabase, and AI integration for team events.
Created various client projects using modern web technologies.
Teaching algorithmics and programming fundamentals to students.
Instructing programming languages including Python, C, and Java.
Designing course materials and exercises for algorithm development.
Mentoring students in problem-solving and computational thinking.

projects.name: Givora
projects.description: Built this app for a hackathon using Next.js, integrating AI-powered APIs. The web app includes authentication via Clerk and helps users get gift suggestions using AI based on provided details.

projects.name: Steadfast Haven
projects.description: Built a custom web application for an American client with dynamic CMS for easy content management and a contact form integrated with SMTP for secure email communication.

projects.name: Funny Time for Colleagues
projects.description: Developing a game app leveraging a polling concept using Supabase as the real-time database, allowing multiple players to interact seamlessly in real time. Integrated AI features to enhance gameplay.

projects.name: FrenzyAI
projects.description: Developed a responsive web application with modern UI, AI-powered chat feature for code generation and topic assistance. Includes light/dark modes and memory capabilities for reviewing past interactions.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio website featuring modern UI, interactive animations, contact form, and AI integration in the CV section. Deployed on GitHub Pages with a free domain via GitHub Student Pack.
